LG’s transparent OLED TV will put a very visible $60,000 hole in your wallet - The Verge
summary:
LG’s Transparent OLED TV Launches at $60,000

Publication Date: January 8, 2024 Source: The Verge

LG introduces its Signature OLED T, a transparent TV priced at $59,999, available at select retailers and LG’s official website.

This innovative 77-inch television features both transparent and opaque modes, offering unique software features such as T-Objet, T-Bar, and T-Home for an enhanced user experience.

  • Price: $59,999.
  • Available at select LG-authorized retailers.
  • Features transparent mode for visibility of items behind the screen.
  • Includes unique software features not found in other LG models.
“The OLED T is forever out of reach for mere peasants like myself.” - Author

While the OLED T is a showcase of luxury and technology, its steep price may deter many potential buyers.
newTitle: LG’s Transparent OLED TV Launches at $60,000

title: OpenAI makes ChatGPT available for phone calls and texts - CNBC
summary:
OpenAI makes ChatGPT available for phone calls and texts

Date: December 04, 2024

Source: CNBC

OpenAI has launched a new service that allows users to communicate with its ChatGPT chatbot via phone calls and WhatsApp.

  • Users can call 1-800-CHATGPT (1-800-242-8478) or message via WhatsApp.
  • Initially, users will receive 15 minutes of free use each month.
  • This release comes as part of a series of updates from OpenAI.
  • The company aims to grow its user base by hiring a chief marketing officer.
  • The generative AI market is projected to exceed $1 trillion in revenue by 2032.
  • OpenAI's latest funding round valued the company at $157 billion.
“We’re working on ways to integrate WhatsApp messages with ChatGPT credentials.” - OpenAI Team

This phone and messaging service marks another step in OpenAI's aggressive growth strategy as they compete within the expanding AI landscape.
newTitle: OpenAI Introduces ChatGPT for Phone Calls and Texts

Apple’s Big Foldable iPhone and iPad Plans Revealed: Here’s What To Expect

Date: December 18, 2024
Source: News18

Apple is preparing to enter the foldable device market within the next few years, with plans for both a foldable iPhone and a large foldable iPad. Current reports suggest that the first of these products could be unveiled between 2026 and 2028.

  • The first foldable device is expected to resemble the iPhone with a larger display than the upcoming iPhone 16 Pro Max.
  • A foldable iPad-Mac fusion device with a massive 19-inch display is also in the works.
  • Apple's entry into the foldable segment comes as competitors like Google continue to innovate in this space.
  • The company is also focusing on AI advancements anticipated for rollout in 2025.
“The foldable is a new landscape for all the brands and a fresh start could be the right way to go about it.”

Apple's strategic move into foldable technology represents a significant shift in their product lineup, elevating expectations for innovation in the tech industry.

title: OpenAI Now Lets Few Developers Use 01 Reasoning Model in API - AutoGPT
summary:
OpenAI Now Lets Few Developers Use 01 Reasoning Model in API

Publication Date: Not specified Source: OpenAI

OpenAI has launched its 01 reasoning model in its API, offering select developers in the “tier 5” usage category access starting December 17, 2024. This model is designed to improve the accuracy of AI responses.

  • The 01 reasoning model performs self-checks on its answers, enhancing reliability.
  • Developers must meet specific criteria, including spending $1,000 with OpenAI and having an established account.
  • New features include function calling, developer messages, reasoning effort parameters, and image analysis.
  • The model is more expensive than previous versions, reflecting its advanced capabilities.
“Even though the pricing and access restrictions might limit its initial adoption, 01’s potential to reshape industries is undeniable.”

The launch of 01 represents a significant advancement in AI, focusing on precision and reliability for developers in various industries.
newTitle: OpenAI Now Lets Few Developers Use 01 Reasoning Model in API

title: Most downloaded games on iPhone 2024: BGMI, Ludo King, Subway Surfer and more - Moneycontrol
New Gmail Security Warning For 2.5 Billion—Second Attack Wave Incoming - Forbes
summary:
New Gmail Security Warning For 2.5 Billion—Second Attack Wave Incoming

Date: December 18, 2024

Source: Forbes

Google has issued a warning about a second wave of cyber threats targeting Gmail users, advising all 2.5 billion users on how to stay safe. Despite a 35% decrease in phishing attacks compared to last year, Google emphasizes the persistence of attackers and the importance of maintaining security.

Key Points:

  • Google has observed a surge in email traffic since mid-November, increasing the challenge of protecting Gmail inboxes.
  • New AI models have been developed to enhance Gmail's security defenses, blocking 20% more spam and scams.
  • Currently rising scams include Gmail extortion scams, fake invoice scams, and celebrity impersonation scams.
  • Users are advised to take their time, do research, and report suspicious messages to enhance security.
“No reputable person or agency will ever demand payment or your personal information on the spot.” — Andy Wen, Gmail’s senior director of product management

In conclusion, Google remains committed to enhancing user security through advanced technology and user education as cyber threats continue to evolve.
newTitle: New Gmail Security Warning For 2.5 Billion—Second Attack Wave Incoming

Nothing OS 3.0 Now Available for Phone (2) and Phone (2a): Here’s What’s New

Publication Date: December 2024   |   Source: Indian Express

Nothing today announced the rollout of the stable version of Nothing OS 3.0 for the Phone (2) and Phone (2a), which introduces a range of new features and customisation options.

  • Redesigned lock screen with fully customisable options.
  • New gallery app with a minimalistic interface and expanded editing tools.
  • AI-powered features to be added in future updates.
  • New Countdown timer widget and Shared Widgets feature.
  • AI-powered auto-sort functionality for app drawer.
  • Updated quick settings and Enhanced Pop-up view for multitasking.
  • Available for Phone (2) and Phone (2a) by the end of the year; other models will have to wait until next year.

Nothing OS 3.0 brings substantial improvements and new functionalities, enhancing the overall user experience for Phone (2) and Phone (2a) users.

iPhone 15 selling at the lowest price - India Today
summary:
iPhone 15 Selling at the Lowest Price on Flipkart

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: India Today

Currently, the iPhone 15 is being offered at the lowest price on Flipkart, making it an opportune time for potential buyers.

  • The 128GB model of the iPhone 15 is priced at Rs 58,999, down from Rs 69,999, offering a discount of Rs 11,000.
  • This offer applies to all color models of the iPhone 15.
  • Exchange offers may further reduce the price.
  • The iPhone 15 features a 6.1-inch display and comes in five colors: pink, yellow, green, blue, and black.
  • While it lacks support for Apple Intelligence (AI), it promises a satisfactory experience for users.
  • The device is equipped with a 48-megapixel primary camera for excellent photography in various lighting conditions.
  • Battery life is designed for all-day usage, averaging around 9 hours.
  • The phone is powered by the new A16 Bionic chip that enhances speed and efficiency.
  • Now includes a USB Type-C charging port, replacing the previous Lightning connector.
“Apple says the battery of iPhone 15 is designed for all-day usage.”

This promotional sale on the iPhone 15 provides a significant opportunity for buyers looking to save on a new smartphone.
newTitle: iPhone 15 Selling at the Lowest Price on Flipkart

summary:
Poco M7 Pro and C75 Series 5G Phones Launched in India

Published on: 18 December 2024, 11:28 IST

Source: Deccan Herald

Poco, Xiaomi's subsidiary, has launched two new 5G smartphones, the M7 Pro and C75 series, in India, which come with impressive specifications and features tailored for various market segments.

  • The M7 Pro features a 6.67-inch full HD+ super AMOLED display with a variable refresh rate and up to 2,100 nits peak brightness.
  • It is powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 7025 Ultra processor, with configurations up to 8GB RAM and a 5,110mAh battery.
  • The M7 Pro comes equipped with a dual camera setup including a 50MP main sensor and a 20MP front camera.
  • The C75 offers a 6.88-inch HD+ display with a Snapdragon 4s Gen 2 processor and a slightly lower price point.
“The Poco M7 Pro will be available in two configurations for Rs 14,999 and Rs 16,999.”

The Poco C75 is priced at Rs 7,999 and also comes with attractive features suitable for budget-conscious consumers.

Reliance Jio launches JioTag Go Android tracker using Google’s Find My Device network in India - The Hindu
summary:
Reliance Jio launches JioTag Go Android tracker using Google’s Find My Device network in India

Date: December 18, 2024

Source: The Hindu

Reliance Jio has launched the JioTag Go, an Android-based tracker that utilizes Google’s Find My Device network to provide location updates for essential items.

  • The JioTag Go is a coin-sized device that tracks keys, wallets, and other items.
  • It has a battery life of up to 365 days, and the battery is replaceable.
  • Weighing around 9 grams, it features a built-in speaker that can emit sound up to 120db.
  • The device is compatible with any Android device using the Google Find My Device app.
  • JioTag Go retails for ₹1,499 and is available in multiple stores.
“You can still check the last location detected by Google’s Find My Device network along with the last seen time.”

This launch expands Jio's offerings in the tracking device market following the launch of JioTag Air for iOS.
newTitle: Reliance Jio launches JioTag Go Android tracker using Google’s Find My Device network in India

6 unique features of Galaxy AI and the list of compatible Samsung smartphones - The Indian Express
summary:
Six Unique Features of Galaxy AI and Compatible Samsung Smartphones

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: Indian Express

Samsung's Galaxy AI brings advanced features to its smartphones, designed to enhance user experience and productivity. Available on a variety of Samsung devices, these AI capabilities integrate seamlessly with existing apps.

  • Google Circle to Search: An intuitive feature allowing users to search for products or information by circling items on their screen.
  • Instant Call Translation: Galaxy AI translates audio calls in real-time across various apps, easing communication in foreign languages.
  • Advanced Photo Editing: Users can manipulate images by extending, removing, or adding objects, enhancing creativity with image editing tools.
  • Document Summarization: The Notes app can summarize large documents into concise information, saving users time.
  • Audio Transcription: Audio recordings can be automatically transcribed into text, facilitating easier note-taking and documentation.
  • Sketch to Image Conversion: This feature transforms basic drawings into detailed images, bringing creative ideas to life.
“These are the top six Galaxy AI capabilities that I use on a day-to-day basis.”
newTitle: Six Unique Features of Galaxy AI and Compatible Samsung Smartphones

title: WhatsApp expands features with in-app dialer, group mentions in Status - India TV News
summary:
WhatsApp Expands Features with In-App Dialer and Group Mentions in Status

Publication Date: December 2024 Source: India TV News

WhatsApp continues to enhance its user experience with two new features aimed at improving the way users interact with the app. The updates include the ability to mention groups in status and an in-app dialer for iPhone users.

  • The new group mention feature in status updates allows users to address entire groups without tagging members individually.
  • This feature is currently in beta testing for Android users and is expected to launch for all by January 2025.
  • The in-app dialer for iPhone allows users to make calls directly from WhatsApp without saving contacts first, simplifying the calling process.
“This enhancement is set to make calling more convenient for everyone.”

WhatsApp's ongoing enhancements aim to improve communication across its platform, making everyday interactions smoother and more efficient.
newTitle: WhatsApp Expands Features with In-App Dialer and Group Mentions in Status

title: Reliance Jio launches JioTag Go: India’s first tracker compatible with Google’s Find My Device network - The Financial Express
summary:
Reliance Jio Launches JioTag Go: India's First Google-Compatible Tracker

Date: Not specified Source: Financial Express

Reliance Jio has officially launched the JioTag Go, India's first tracker designed to work with Google's Find My Device network, helping Android users track their belongings seamlessly.

  • The JioTag Go is a coin-sized tracker that connects to the Google Find My Device app for real-time location updates.
  • It uses Bluetooth and the Google Find My Device network for locating items such as keys and wallets.
  • The tracker can monitor various personal items including bags, electronics, and even bikes.
  • Available in attractive colors, it retails for Rs 1499 on multiple platforms including Amazon and JioMart.
“With the increasing number of people relying on their smartphones for everything, having a tool to track valuables has become essential.”

The launch of JioTag Go further expands Jio's offerings to accommodate both Android and iOS users in tracking their belongings through their respective networks.
newTitle: Reliance Jio Launches JioTag Go: India's First Google-Compatible Tracker

The OnePlus 13R is set to launch in January 2024 as a successor to the OnePlus 12R, featuring the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 SoC and 16GB of RAM. It has been spotted on Geekbench, indicating significant performance capabilities.

  • Scheduled for global launch on January 7, 2024.
  • Listed on Geekbench with model number CPH2691.
  • Achieved 2,189 points in single-core and 6,613 in multi-core tests.

  • Expected to be a rebranded version of OnePlus Ace 5.
“The OnePlus 13R is expected to debut as a rebranded version of the OnePlus Ace 5.”

In conclusion, the OnePlus 13R appears to be a promising device with high performance, set to attract attention in early 2024.
